caption.title: Replication kinetics in MDCK cells of recombinant influenza A and B viruses carrying a single NA amino acid substitution.
caption.p: MDCK cells were infected with recombinant influenza A and B viruses at an MOI of 1 (A, C) or 0.001 (B, D). Virus titers were determined by TCID 50 assays in MDCK cells after incubation for 72 h at 35°C (for influenza A viruses) or 33°C (for influenza B viruses). Each data point represents the mean virus titer (log 10TCID 50/mL) ± the SD from three independent experiments. * P < 0.05.
